anya-e0802n2:5: Yathā yathā jinavacanayuttaṁ hi liṅgaṁ, tathā tathā idha liṅgañca nippajjate.
anya-e0802n2:6: Taṁ yathā? Eso no satthā, brahmā attā, sakhā, rājā.
anya-e0802n2:8: Tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi vibhattiyo parā honti.
anya-e0802n2:9: 55, 63.Si yo, aṁ yo, nā hi, sa naṁ, smā hi, sa naṁ, smiṁ su.
anya-e0802n2:10: Kā ca pana tāyo vibhattiyo? Si, yo iti paṭhamā, aṁ, yoiti dutiyā, nā hi iti tatiyā, sa, naṁiti catutthī, smā, hi iti pañcamī, sa, naṁ iti chaṭṭhī, smiṁ, su iti sattamī.
anya-e0802n2:11: Vibhattiiccanena kvattho? Amhassa mamaṁ savibhattissa se.
anya-e0802n2:13: Yathā yathā tesaṁ jinavacanānaṁ anuparodho. Tathā tathā idha liṅgañca nippajjate.
anya-e0802n2:16: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:22: Isino , aggino, gahapatino, daṇḍino. Setuno, ketuno, bhikkhuno. Sayambhuno, abhibhuno.
anya-e0802n2:23: Jhalaiccanena kvattho? Jhalato sassa no vā.
anya-e0802n2:25: Te ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā yadā itthikhyā, tadā pasaññā honti.
anya-e0802n2:30: Ākāro yadā itthikhyo, tadā ghasañño hoti.
anya-e0802n2:31: Saddhāya, kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, disāya sālāya, mālāya, tulāya, dolāya, pabhāya, sobhāya, paññāya, karuṇāya nāvāya, kapālikāya.
anya-e0802n2:33: Itthikhyoti kimatthaṁ? Satthārā desito ayaṁ dhammo.
anya-e0802n2:37: Purisassa, aggissa, isissa, daṇḍissa, bhikkhussa, sayambhussa, abhibhussa.
anya-e0802n2:41: Etissaṁ, etissā imissaṁ, imissā, tissaṁ, tissā,
anya-e0802n2:42: Tassaṁ tassā, yassaṁ, yassā, amussaṁ, amussā.
anya-e0802n2:47: Etāimāiccetesamanto saro ikāro hoti saṁsāsu ekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0802n2:52: Tassā itthiyaṁ vattamānassa antassa ākārassa ikāro hoti vā saṁsāsu ekavacanesu vibhattādesesu.
anya-e0802n2:55: Tato tā etā imāto sassa vibhattissa ssāyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:60: Tassaṁ, tassā, yassaṁ, yassā, sabbassaṁ, sabbassā.
anya-e0802n2:64: Dviiccevamādito saṅkhyāto nakārāgamo hoti naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:65: Dvinnaṁ, tinnaṁ, catunnaṁ, pañcannaṁ, channaṁ, sattannaṁ, aṭṭhannaṁ, navannaṁ, dasannaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:68: Caggahaṇenassañcāgamo hoti. Catassannaṁ itthīnaṁ tissannaṁ vedanānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:70: Paiccetasmā smiṁsmāiccetesaṁ aṁāādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:71: Matyaṁ, matiyaṁ, matyā, matiyā, nikatyaṁ. Nikatiyaṁ, nikatyā, nikatiyā, vikatyaṁ, vikatiyaṁ, vikatyā, vikatiyā, viratyaṁ, viratiyaṁ, viratyā, viratiyā, ratyaṁ, ratiyaṁ, ratyā, ratiyā, puthabyaṁ, puthaviyaṁ, puthabyā, puthaviyā, pavatyaṁ, pavatyā, pavattiyaṁ, pavattiyā.
anya-e0802n2:75: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Ādismiṁ, ādimhi nāthaṁ namassitvāna,
anya-e0802n2:76: Caggahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṁ vacanassa ā o aṁādesā honti. Divā ca ratto ca haranti ye bali. Bārāṇasiṁ ahu rājā.
anya-e0802n2:78: Jhalaiccetesaṁ iya uvaiccete ādesā honti vā sare pare yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:79: Tiyantaṁ pacchiyāgāre, aggiyāgāre, bhikkhuvāsane nisīdati, vuthuvāsane nisīdati.
anya-e0802n2:80: Sareti kimatthaṁ? Timalaṁ, tiphalaṁ, ticatukkaṁ, tidaṇḍaṁ, tilokaṁ, tinayanaṁ, tipāsaṁ, tihaṁsaṁ, tibhavaṁ, tikhandhaṁ, tipiṭakaṁ, tivedanaṁ, catuddisaṁ, puthubhūtaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:82: Vāti vikappanatthaṁ, ikārassa ayādeso hoti, vatthuttayaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:84: Jhalānaṁ yakāra vakārādesā honti sare pare yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:88: Pasaññassa ca ivaṇṇassa vibhattādese sare pare yakārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:92: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:95: Goiccetassa okārassa āvādeso hoti yoiccetesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:96: Gāvo gacchanti, gāvo passanti, gāvī gacchanti, gāvī passanti.
anya-e0802n2:97: Caggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Nāsmāsmiṁsu vacanesu āvā deso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:100: Goiccetassa okārassa āvaavaiccete ādesā honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:102: Caggahaṇena sādisesesu pubbuttavacanesu goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:103: Gavassa, gavo, gavena, gavā, gave, gavesu.
anya-e0802n2:105: Āvaiccetassa gāvādesassa anta sarassa ukārādeso hoti vā aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:109: Tato gosaddato naṁvacanassa aṁādeso hoti, goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti patimhi pare alutte ca samāse.
anya-e0802n2:112: Caggahaṇena asamāsepi naṁvacanassa aṁādeso hoti, goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:115: Goiccetassa okārassa avādeso hoti samāse ca sare pare.
anya-e0802n2:117: Caggahaṇena uvaṇṇaiccevamantānaṁ liṅgānaṁ uvaavaurādesā honti smiṁyoiccetesu kvaci.
anya-e0802n2:121: Tassa avasaddassa yadā upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassa okārassa viparīto hoti byañjane pare.
anya-e0802n2:125: Sabbasseva gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:129: Sabbā gāvī ujuṁ yanti, nette ujuṁ gate sati.
anya-e0802n2:132: Suhināiccetesu sabbassa gosaddassa goṇādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:134: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Gosu, gohi, gobhi, gavena.
anya-e0802n2:135: Caggahaṇena syādisesesu pubbuttaravacanesupi goṇa gu gavayādesā honti. Goṇo, goṇā, goṇaṁ, goṇe, goṇassa, goṇamhā. Goṇamhi, gunnaṁ, gavayehi, gavayebhi.
anya-e0802n2:137: Aṁvacanassa makārassa ca jhalapaiccetehi niggahitaṁ hoti
anya-e0802n2:138: Aggiṁ, isiṁ, gahapatiṁ, daṇḍiṁ, mahesiṁ, bhikkhuṁ, paṭuṁ, sayambhuṁ, abhibhuṁ, rattiṁ, itthiṁ, vadhuṁ, pulliṅgaṁ, pumbhāvo, puṅkokilo.
anya-e0802n2:139: Aṁmoti kimatthaṁ? Agginā, pāṇinā, bhikkhunā, rattiyā, itthiyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:141: Punārambha haṇaṁ vibhāsānivattanatthaṁ. Aggiṁ, paṭuṁ, buddhiṁ, vadhuṁ.
anya-e0802n2:143: Saralopo hoti amādesapaccayādimhi sara lope tu pakati hoti.
anya-e0802n2:144: Purisaṁ, purise, pāpaṁ, pāpe, pāpiyo, pāpiṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:145: Amādesapaccayādimhīti ki tthaṁ? Appamādo amataṁ padaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:148: Pakatiggahaṇasāmatthena puna sandhibhāvo ca hoti. Seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:151: Itthiṁ, itthiyo, itthiyā. Vadhuṁ, vadhuyo, vadhuyā. Daṇḍiṁ, daṇḍino, daṇḍinā. Sayambhuṁ, sayambhuvo, sayambhunā.
anya-e0802n2:157: Sismiṁ anapuṁsakāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjante. Itthī, bhikkhunī, vadhū, daṇḍī, sayambhū.
anya-e0802n2:158: Sismiṁnti kimatthaṁ? Bhoti itthi, bhoti vadhu, bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu.
anya-e0802n2:159: Anapuṁsakānīti kimatthaṁ? Sukhakāri dānaṁ, sukhakāri sīlaṁ, sīghayāyi cittaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:165: Naṁvacanassa iṇṇaṁ iṇṇannaṁ iccete ādesā honti tīhi saṅkhyāhi.
anya-e0802n2:170: Aggī, bhikkhū, rattī, yāgū, aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni, āyū, āyūni, sabbāni, yāni, tāni, kāni, katamāni, etāni, apūni, imāni.
anya-e0802n2:171: Yosvīti kimatthaṁ? Aggi, bhikkhu, ratti, yāgu, sabbo, yo, so, ko, amuko.
anya-e0802n2:173: Punārambhaggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Niccadīpanatthaṁ. Aggī, bhikkhū, rattī, yāni, tāni, katamāni.
anya-e0802n2:176: Aggīsu, aggīnaṁ, aggīhi, rattīsu, rattīnaṁ, rattīhi. Bhikkhūsu, bhikkhūnaṁ, bhikkhūhi. Purisānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:178: Caggahaṇamavadhāraṇatthaṁ. Sukhettesu brahmacārisu, dhammamakkhāsi bhagavā bhikkhunaṁ datvā sakehi pāṇibhi.
anya-e0802n2:181: Pañcasu, pañcannaṁ, pañcahi, chasu, channaṁ, chahi, sattasu, sattannaṁ, sattahi, aṭṭhasu, aṭṭhannaṁ, aṭṭhahi, navasu, navannaṁ, navahi, dasasu, dasannaṁ, dasahi.
anya-e0802n2:183: Attamitibhāvaniddeso ubhayassāgamanatthaṁ, anto ukāro attamāpajjate. Catassannaṁ itthīnaṁ. Tissannaṁ vedanānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:193: Caggahaṇena aññesu vacanesu attañca hoti. Guṇavantasmiṁ, guṇavantena.
anya-e0802n2:194: Antaggahaṇena ntupaccayassa anto attamāpajjate, yonañca ikāro hoti. Guṇavanti.
anya-e0802n2:196: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa attaṁ hoti vā aṁsaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:197: Satimaṁ bhikkhu, satimantaṁ bhikkhuṁ vā, bandhumaṁ rājānaṁ, bandhumantaṁ rājānaṁ vā, satimassa bhikkhuno, satimato bhikkhuno vā, bandhumassa rañño suṅkaṁ, bandhumato rañño vā suṅkaṁ deti.
anya-e0802n2:198: Etesvīti kimatthaṁ? Satimā bhikkhu, bandhumā rājā.
anya-e0802n2:200: Ntupaccayassa antassa attaṁ hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:204: Aggissantassa ini hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:205: Purato aggini, pacchato aggini, dakkhiṇato aggini, vāmato aggini.
anya-e0802n2:220: Mātulaiccevamādīnaṁ anto ānattamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:222: Īkāreti kimatthaṁ? Bhikkhunī, rājinī, jālinī, gahapatānī.
anya-e0802n2:223: Ānattaggahaṇena nadīiccetassa dīsaddassa jjojjā ādesā honti saha vibhattiyā yonāsaiccetesu. Najjo sandanti, najjā kataṁ taraṅgaṁ, najjā nerañjarāya tīre.
anya-e0802n2:225: Sabbato liṅgato smāhismiṁ iccetesaṁ mhābhimhiiccete ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:226: Purisamhā, purisasmā, purisebhi, purisehi, purisamhi, purisasmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:227: Smāhismiṁnamiti kimatthaṁ? Vaṇṇavantaṁ agandhakaṁ viruḷhapupphaṁ, mahantaṁ chattaṁ mahāchattaṁ, mahantaṁ dhajaṁ mahādhajaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:229: Ta imaiccetehi katākārehi smāsmiṁ naṁmhāmhiiccete ādesā neva honti.
anya-e0802n2:230: Asmā ṭhānā bhayaṁ uppajjati, asmiṁ ṭhāne bhayaṁ tiṭṭhati, asmā, asmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:231: Katākārehīti kimatthaṁ? Tamhā, tamhi, imamhā, imamhi.
anya-e0802n2:234: Sabbesu, yesu, tesu, kesu, purisesu, imesu, kusalesu, tumhesu, amhesu, sabbehi, yehi, tehi, kehi, purisehi, imehi, kusalehi, tumhehi, amhehi.
anya-e0802n2:236: Sabbesaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ anto akāro ettamāpajjate naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:237: Sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ, yesaṁ, yesānaṁ, tesaṁ, tesānaṁ, imesaṁ, imesānaṁ, kesaṁ, kesānaṁ, itaresaṁ, itaresānaṁ, katamesaṁ, katamesānaṁ. Sabbanāmānamiti kimatthaṁ? Buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo.
anya-e0802n2:243: Sabbena, yena, tena, kena, anena, purisena, rūpena.
anya-e0802n2:248: Sabbo, yo, so, ko, amuko, puriso.
anya-e0802n2:252: Tasmā akārato nāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:253: Atthaso dhammaṁ jānāti, byañjanaso atthaṁ jānāti, akkharaso, suttaso, padaso, yasaso. Upāyaso, sabbaso, thāmaso, ṭhānaso.
anya-e0802n2:254: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Pādena vā pādārahena vā atirekapādena vā yo bhikkhu theyyacittena parassa bhaṇḍaṁ gaṇhāti, so bhikkhu pārājiko hoti asaṁvāso.
anya-e0802n2:260: Tasmā akārato sabbesaṁ yonīnaṁāe ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:264: Akāratoti kimatthaṁ? Daṇḍino, aṭṭhīni, aggī pajjalanti, munī caranti.
anya-e0802n2:266: Tasmā akārato sabbesaṁ smāsmiṁiccetesaṁ ā e ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:268: Akāratoti kimatthaṁ? Daṇḍinā, daṇḍismiṁ, bhikkhunā, bhikkhusmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:270: Tasmā akārato catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:271: Atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṁ buddho loke uppajjati.
anya-e0802n2:275: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā.
anya-e0802n2:278: Tehi sabbanāmehi akārantehi smāsmiṁ saiccetesaṁ tayo ā e āyādesā neva honti.
anya-e0802n2:279: Sabbasmā , sabbasmiṁ, sabbassa. Yasmā, yasmiṁ, yassa. Tasmā, tasmiṁ, tassa. Kasmā, kasmiṁ, kassa. Imasmā, imasmiṁ, imassa.
anya-e0802n2:283: Tasmā ghato nādīnamekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ āyādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:284: Kaññāya kataṁ kammaṁ, kaññāya dīyate, kaññāya nissaṭaṁ vatthaṁ. Kaññāya pariggaho, kaññāya patiṭṭhitaṁ sīlaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:285: Ghatoti kimatthaṁ? Rattiyā, itthiyā, dhenuyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:286: Nādīnamiti kimatthaṁ? Kaññaṁ passati, vijjaṁ, vīṇaṁ, gaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:287: Ekavacanānamiti kimatthaṁ? Sabbāsu, yāsu, tāsu, kāsu, imāsu, pabhāsu.
anya-e0802n2:289: Tasmā pato nādīnamekavacanānaṁ vibhattigaṇānaṁ yāādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:290: Rattiyā , itthiyā, deviyā, dhenuyā, yāguyā, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:291: Nādīnamiti kimatthaṁ? Rattī, rattiṁ, itthī, itthiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:292: Patoti kimatthaṁ? Kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, pabhāya, sobhāya.
anya-e0802n2:295: Tasmā sakhato gassa akāra ākāra ikāra īkāra ekārādesā honti vā.
anya-e0802n2:296: Bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sakhi, bho sakhī, bho sakhe.
anya-e0802n2:299: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:302: Tato ammādito gassa ekārattaṁ na hoti.
anya-e0802n2:303: Bhoti ammā, bhoti annā, bhoti ambā, bhoti tātā.
anya-e0802n2:306: Tasmā akatarassā lato yvālapanassa vevoādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:310: Ālapanasseti kimatthaṁ? Te hetavo, te bhikkhavo.
anya-e0802n2:312: Tasmā jhalato sassa vibhattissa no ādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:313: Aggino, aggissa, sakhino, sakhissa, daṇḍino, daṇḍissa, bhikkhuno, bhikkhussa, sayambhuno, sayambhussa.
anya-e0802n2:317: Tehi ghapajhalaiccetehi yonaṁ lopo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:318: Kaññā, kaññāyo. Rattī, rattiyo, itthī, itthiyo, yāgū, yāguyo, vadhū, vadhuyo. Aggī, aggayo. Bhikkhū, bhikkhavo. Sayambhū, sayambhuvo. Aṭṭhī, aṭṭhīni, āyū, āyūni.
anya-e0802n2:321: Tasmā lato yonaṁ vokāro hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:323: Kāraggahaṇaṁ kimatthaṁ? Yonaṁ no ca hoti. Jantuno.
anya-e0802n2:324: Caggahaṇamavadhāraṇatthaṁ, amū purisā tiṭṭhanti, amū purise passatha.
anya-e0802n2:328: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mamaṁ ādeso hoti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:331: Sabbasseva amhasaddassa savibhattissa mayaṁādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame.
anya-e0802n2:337: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntoādeso hoti yomhi paṭhame.
anya-e0802n2:342: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa ntassādeso hoti vā se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:346: Sabbassevantupaccayassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:347: Guṇavā, paññavā, sīlavā, balavā, dhanavā, matimā, satimā, dhitimā.
anya-e0802n2:351: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṁādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi napuṁsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:352: Guṇavaṁ cittaṁ tiṭṭhati, rucimaṁ pupphaṁ virocati.
anya-e0802n2:353: Simhīti kimatthaṁ? Vaṇṇavantaṁ agandhakaṁ virūḷhapupphaṁ passasi tvaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:355: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa aṁ avaṇṇā ca honti ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:356: Bho guṇavaṁ, bho guṇava, bho guṇavā.
anya-e0802n2:359: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa totitāādesā honti vā sasmiṁ nāiccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:360: Guṇavato, guṇavantassa, guṇavati, guṇavantasmiṁ, guṇavatā, guṇavantena, satimato, satimantassa, satimati, satimantasmiṁ, satimatā, satimantena.
anya-e0802n2:363: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa savibhattissa taṁādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:365: Naṁmhīti kimatthaṁ? Guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti, satimanto tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0802n2:367: Sabbasseva imasaddassa savibhattissa idaṁādeso hoti vā aṁsisu napuṁsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:368: Idaṁ cittaṁ passasi, idaṁ cittaṁ tiṭṭhati, imaṁ cittaṁ passasi. Imaṁ cittaṁ tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:369: Nathuṁsaketi kimatthaṁ? Imaṁ purisaṁ passasi. Ayaṁ puriso tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:371: Sabbasseva amusaddassa savibhattissa aduṁādeso hoti aṁsisu napuṁsake vattamānassa.
anya-e0802n2:372: Aduṁ pupphaṁ passasi, aduṁ pupphaṁ virocati.
anya-e0802n2:373: Napuṁsaketi kimatthaṁ? Amuṁ rājānaṁ passasi, asu rājā tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0802n2:377: Dvinnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ dve hoti yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:378: Dve itthiyo, dve dhammā. Dve rūpāni.
anya-e0802n2:380: Caggahaṇena duve dvaya ubha ubhaya duvi ca honti yonāanamiccetesu. Duve samaṇā. Duve brāhmaṇā , duve janā, dvayena, dvayaṁ, ubhinnaṁ, ubhayesaṁ duvinnaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:381: 133, 230.Ti catunnaṁ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāri.
anya-e0802n2:382: Ticatunnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tisso catasso tayo cattāro tīṇi cattāriiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:383: Tisso vedanā catasso disā, tayo janā, jane, cattāro purisā, purise, tīṇi āyatanāni, cattāri ariyasaccāni.
anya-e0802n2:386: Pañcādīnaṁ saṅkhyānaṁ itthipumanapuṁsake vattamānānaṁ savibhattissa antassa sarassa akāro hoti yoiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:387: Pañca, pañca, cha, cha, satta, satta, aṭṭha, aṭṭha, nava, nava, dasa, dasa.
anya-e0802n2:390: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa rañño rājinoiccete ādesā honti se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:394: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññaṁādeso hoti vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:397: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññāādeso hoti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:398: Tena raññā kataṁ. Rājena vā kataṁ.
anya-e0802n2:401: Sabbasseva rājasaddassa savibhattissa raññerājiniiccete ādesā honti smiṁmhivibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:404: Sabbesaṁ tumha amha saddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayi mayiiccete ādeso honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ smiṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:406: Smiṁmhīti kimatthaṁ? Tvaṁ bhavasi, ahaṁ bhavāmi.
anya-e0802n2:408: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tvaṁ ahaṁiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:411: Caggahaṇena tuvaṁ ca hoti. Tuvaṁ satthā.
anya-e0802n2:413: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tavamamaiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:417: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tuyhaṁ mayhaṁiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ se vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:421: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ taṁ maiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:425: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tavaṁ mamaṁiccete ādesā honti navā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:430: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ tayā mayāiccete ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:434: Sabbassa tumhasaddassa savibhattissa tuvaṁ tvaṁ iccete ādesā honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:435: Kaliṅgarassa tuvaṁ maññe, kaṭṭhassa tvaṁ maññe.
anya-e0802n2:437: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ vo noādesā honti navā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ dutiyā catutthīchaṭṭhīiccetesu bahuvacanesu.
anya-e0802n2:438: Pahāya vo bhikkhave gamissāmi, mā no ajja vikantiṁsu, rañño sūdā mahānase, evaṁ dutiyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:439: Dhammaṁ vo bhikkhave desessāmi, saṁvibhajetha no rajjena, evaṁ catutthyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:440: Tuṭṭhosmi vo bhikkhave pakatiyā, satthā no bhagavā anuppatto, evaṁ chaṭṭhyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:446: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ te me ādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ catutthīchaṭṭhīiccetesu ekavacanesu.
anya-e0802n2:447: Dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dadāhi me gāmavaraṁ, idaṁ te raṭṭhaṁ, ayaṁ me putto.
anya-e0802n2:448: Padatoti kimatthaṁ? Tava ñāti, mama ñāti.
anya-e0802n2:450: Sabbesaṁ tumha amhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ te meādesā na honti aṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:451: Passeyya taṁ vassasataṁ arogaṁ, so maṁ bravīti.
anya-e0802n2:453: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ temeādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ tatiyekavacane pare.
anya-e0802n2:454: Kataṁ te pāpaṁ, kataṁ me pāpaṁ, kataṁ tayā pāpaṁ, kataṁ mayā pāpaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:455: Padatoti kimatthaṁ? Tayā kataṁ, mayā kataṁ.
anya-e0802n2:457: Sabbesaṁ tumhaamhasaddānaṁ savibhattīnaṁ yadā padasmā paresaṁ vonoādesā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ tatiyābahuvacanesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:458: Kataṁ vo kammaṁ, kataṁ no kammaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:459: Padatoti kimatthaṁ? Tumhehi kataṁ, amhehi kataṁ.
anya-e0802n2:460: Bahuvacanaggahaṇena yomhi paṭhame vo noādesā honti. Gāmaṁ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṁ no gaccheyyāma.
anya-e0802n2:462: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa āādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:465: Antaggahaṇena maghava yuvaiccevamādīnamantassasavibhattissa āādeso hoti. Maghavā, yuvā.
anya-e0802n2:467: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa aṁādeso hoti ālapanekavacane pare.
anya-e0802n2:472: Pumaiccevamantassa samāse ca aṁādeso hoti vibhāsā samāse kate.
anya-e0802n2:473: Itthī ca pumā ca napuṁsakaṁ ca itthipumanapuṁsakāni. Itthipumanapuṁsakānaṁ samūho itthipumanapuṁsakasamūho.
anya-e0802n2:476: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa ānoādeso hoti yosu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0802n2:480: Pumaiccevamantassa savibhattissa āne ādeso hoti vā smiṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:486: Caggahaṇena maghava yuvaiccevamādīnamantassa ānaādeso hoti si yo aṁyo iccetesu vibhattīsu, pumakammathāmantassa cukāro hoti sasmā su vibhattīsu. Maghavāno, maghavānā. Maghavānaṁ, maghavāne . Yuvāno, yuvānā, yuvānaṁ, yuvāne, pumuno, pumunā. Kammuno, kammunā, thāmuno, thāmunā.
anya-e0802n2:491: Pumaiccevamantassa āuādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:495: Kammaiccevamantassa ca ua ādesā honti vā nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:497: Caggahaṇena maghavayuvaiccevamantassa āāde so hoti kvaci nāsuiccetesu vibhattīsu. Maghavānā, maghavāsu, maghavesu, maghavena vā. Yuvānā, yuvāsu, yuvesu, yuvena vā.
anya-e0802n2:505: Tehi tumhaamhehi yo appaṭhamo ākaṁhoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:506: Tumhākaṁ passāmi, tumhe passāmi vā. Amhākaṁ passasi, amhe passasi vā.
anya-e0802n2:508: Appaṭhamoti kimatthaṁ? Gacchatha tumhe, gacchāma mayaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:509: Vātivikappanatthena yonaṁ aṁ ānaṁ honti. Tumhaṁ tumhānaṁ. Amhaṁ, amhānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:511: Tehi humhaamhehi sassa vibhattissa aṁ ādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:512: Tumhaṁ dīyate, tava dīyate. Tumhaṁ pariggaho, tava pariggaho. Amhaṁ dīyate, mama dīyate. Amhaṁ pariggaho, mama pariggaho.
anya-e0802n2:515: Sabbesaṁ sabbanāmānaṁ akārato yo paṭhamo ettamāpajjate.
anya-e0802n2:516: Sabbe, ye, te, ke, tumhe, amhe, ime.
anya-e0802n2:517: Sabbanāmāti kimatthaṁ? Devā, asurā, nāgā, gandhabbā, manussā.
anya-e0802n2:519: Yoti kimatthaṁ? Sabbo, yo, so, ko, ayaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:522: Tasmā sabbanāma’kārato dvandaṭṭhā yo paṭhamo ettamāpajjate vā.
anya-e0802n2:530: Bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmavidhānañca nāññaṁ kāriyaṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n2:532: Ceti kimatthaṁ? Sabbanāmavidhānaṁ hoti, dakkhiṇa pubbassaṁ, dakkhiṇapubbassā, uttarapubbassaṁ, uttarapubbassā.
anya-e0802n2:534: Sabbato sabbanāmato naṁvacanassa saṁsānaṁiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:535: Sabbesaṁ, sabbesānaṁ, sabbāsaṁ, sabbāsānaṁ. Yesaṁ, yesānaṁ, yāsaṁ, yāsānaṁ. Tesaṁ, tesānaṁ, tāsaṁ, tāsānaṁ. Kesaṁ, kesānaṁ, kāsaṁ, kāsānaṁ. Imesaṁ, imesānaṁ, imāsaṁ, imāsānaṁ. Amūsaṁ, amūsānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:536: Namiti kimatthaṁ? Sabbassa, yassa, tassa, kassa. Evaṁ sabbattha.
anya-e0802n2:543: Sabbasseva imasaddassa ekāro hoti vā sunaṁhiiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:544: Esu, imesu, esaṁ, imesaṁ, ehi, ebhi, imehi, imebhi.
anya-e0802n2:545: Imasseti kimatthaṁ? Etesu, etesaṁ, etehi, etebhi.
anya-e0802n2:547: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ana imiiccete ādesā honti nāmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:548: Anena dhammadānena. Sukhitā hotu sā pajā.
anya-e0802n2:550: Nāmhīti kimatthaṁ? Imesu, imesaṁ, imehi, imebhi.
anya-e0802n2:552: Imasaddassa sabbasseva anapuṁsakassa ayaṁādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:555: Simhīti kimatthaṁ? Imaṁ purisaṁ passasi tvaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:557: Amusaddassa anapuṁsakassa makāro sakāramāpajjate vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:558: Asu rājā, asu itthī, amuko rājā, amukā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:563: Eta taiccetesaṁ anapuṁsakānaṁ takāro sakāramāpajjate simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:564: Eso puriso, esā itthī, so puriso, sā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:565: Etatesamiti kimatthaṁ? Itaro puriso, itarā itthī.
anya-e0802n2:566: Anapuṁsakānamiti kimatthaṁ? Etaṁ cittaṁ, etaṁ rūpaṁ. Taṁ cittaṁ, taṁ rūpaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:568: Tassa sabbanāmassa takārassa nattaṁ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:569: Nāya, tāya, naṁ, taṁ, ne, te, nesu, tesu, namhi, tamhi, nāhi, tāhi, nābhi, tābhi.
anya-e0802n2:571: Tassa sabbanāmassa takārassa sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sasmāsmiṁ saṁsāiccetesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:572: Assa, tassa, asmā, tasmā, asmiṁ, tasmiṁ, assaṁ, tassaṁ, assā, tassā.
anya-e0802n2:576: Imasaddassa ca sabbasseva attaṁ hoti vā sasmāsmiṁ saṁ sāiccetesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
anya-e0802n2:577: Assa , imassa, asmā, imasmā, asmiṁ, imasmiṁ, assaṁ, imissaṁ, assā, imissā.
anya-e0802n2:580: Sabbato sabbanāmato kakārāgamo hoti vā simhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:582: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Sabbo, yo, so, ko.
anya-e0802n2:584: Puna sabbatoggahaṇena aññasmāpi kakārāgamo hoti, hīnako, potako.
anya-e0802n2:586: Sabbato sabbanāmato ghapasaññato smiṁsaiccetesaṁ saṁsā ādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:587: Sabbassaṁ, sabbassā, sabbāyaṁ, sabbāya, imissaṁ, imissā, imāyaṁ, imāya, amussaṁ, amussā, amuyaṁ, amuyā.
anya-e0802n2:591: Etehi sabbanāmehi ghapasaññehi smiṁvacanassa neva āya yāādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:592: Etissaṁ, etāyaṁ, imissaṁ, imāyaṁ, amussaṁ, amuyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:594: Etāhīti kimatthaṁ? Kaññāya, vīṇāya, gaṅgāya, kapālikāya.
anya-e0802n2:596: Tasmā manogaṇādito smiṁnāiccetesaṁ ikāraākārādesā honti vā yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:597: Manasi, manusmiṁ, sirasi, sirasmiṁ, manasā, manena, vacasā, vacena, sirasā, sirena, sarasā, sarena, tapasā, tapena, vayasā, vayena, yasasā, yasena, tejasā, tejena, urasā, urena, thāmasā, thāmena.
anya-e0802n2:598: Smiṁnānamiti kimatthaṁ? Mano, siro, tamo, tapo, tejo.
anya-e0802n2:599: Ādiggahaṇena aññāsmāpi smiṁnānaṁ ikāraākārādesā honti, bilasi, bilasā, padasi, padasā.
anya-e0802n2:601: Tasmā manogaṇādito sassa ca okāro hoti.
anya-e0802n2:604: Etesaṁ manogaṇādīnaṁ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kate.
anya-e0802n2:607: Lopeti kimatthaṁ? Padayā, tapasā, yasasā, vacasā, manasā, evamaññepi yojetabbā.
anya-e0802n2:609: Eteheva manogaṇādīhi vibhattādese sare pare sakārāgamo hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:613: Puna ādiggahaṇena aññasmimpi paccaye pare sakārāgamo hoti. Mānasikaṁ, vācasikaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:615: Sabbassa santasaddassa sakārādeso hoti bhakāre pare, ante ca bakārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:626: Caggahaṇaṁ kvaci sakārasseva pasiddhatthaṁ. Sakkāro, sakkato.
anya-e0802n2:629: Gacchaṁ, gacchanto, mahaṁ, mahanto, caraṁ, caranto, khādaṁ, khādanto.
anya-e0802n2:630: Gacchantādīnamiti kimatthaṁ? Anto, danto, vanto, santo.
anya-e0802n2:633: Gacchato, mahato, gacchati, mahati, gacchatā, mahatā.
anya-e0802n2:634: Sesesūti kimatthaṁ? Gacchaṁ, mahaṁ, caraṁ, khādaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:636: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito aṁvacanassa ānaṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:637: Brahmānaṁ, brahmaṁ, attānaṁ, attaṁ, sakhānaṁ, sakhaṁ, rājānaṁ, rājaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:640: Brahma atta sakha rājaiccevamādito sivacanassa ā ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:643: Brahmaatta sakha rājaiccevamādito yonaṁ ānoādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:646: Tasmā sakhato ca yonaṁ āyo no ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:650: Tasmā sakhato smiṁvacanassa ekāro hoti. Sakhe.
anya-e0802n2:652: Tasmā brahmato gassa ca ekāro hoti. He brahme.
anya-e0802n2:658: Tassa sakhantassa āro hoti vā himhi vibhattimhi. Sakhārehi, sakhehi.
anya-e0802n2:660: Tassa sakhantassa āro hoti vā sunaṁ aṁiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:661: Sakhāresu, sakhesu, sakhārānaṁ, sakhīnaṁ, sakhāraṁ, sakhaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:663: Tasmā brahmato smiṁvacanassa niādeso hoti. Brahmani.
anya-e0802n2:664: Tuggahaṇena abrahmatopi smiṁ vacanassa ni hoti. Kammani, cammani, muddhani.
anya-e0802n2:670: Satthupituādīnamanto attamāpajjate sismiṁ, silopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:672: Sisminti kimatthaṁ? Satthussa, pitussa, mātussa, bhātussa, kattussa.
anya-e0802n2:675: Satthāraṁ, pitaraṁ, mātaraṁ, bhātaraṁ, kattāraṁ, satthārehi, pitarehi, mātarehi, bhātarehi, kattārehi.
anya-e0802n2:676: Aññesvīti kimatthaṁ? Satthā, pitā, mātā, bhātā, kattā.
anya-e0802n2:680: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Satthānaṁ, pitūnaṁ, mātūnaṁ, bhātūnaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:682: Tassa satthusaddassa anto attamāpajjate vā naṁmhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:684: Vāti kimatthaṁ? Satthārānaṁ, pitarānaṁ, mātarānaṁ, bhātarānaṁ, dhītarānaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:687: Satthupituiccevamādīnamantassa uttaṁ hoti vā sasmiṁ, salopo ca.
anya-e0802n2:688: Satthu , satthussa, satthuno dīyate, pariggaho vā. Pitu, pitussa, pituno dīyate, pariggaho vā. Bhātu, bhātussa, bhātuno dīyate, pariggaho vā.
anya-e0802n2:691: Sakkamandhātuiccevamādīnamanto uttamāpajjate sasmiṁ, salopo ca hoti.
anya-e0802n2:692: Sakkamandhātu iva assa rājino vibhavo. Evaṁ kattu, gantu, dātu iccevamādī.
anya-e0802n2:696: Tato ārādesato sabbesaṁ yo naṁ okārādeso hoti.
anya-e0802n2:697: Satthāro, pitaro, mātaro, bhātaro, kattāro, vattāro.
anya-e0802n2:698: Tuggahaṇena aññasmāpi yonaṁ okāro hoti. Caturo janā, gāvo, ubho purisā.
anya-e0802n2:701: Satthari, pitari, mātari, dhītari, bhātari, kattari, vattari.
anya-e0802n2:702: Puna tatogahaṇena aññasmāpi smiṁvacanassa ikāro hoti. Bhuvi.
anya-e0802n2:705: Satthārā, pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, dhītarā, kattārā, vattārā.
anya-e0802n2:708: Satthari, pitari, mātari, dhītari, kattari, vattari.
anya-e0802n2:711: Pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, mītarā pitaro, mātaro, bhātaro, dhītaro.
anya-e0802n2:712: Asimhiggahaṇaṁtomhi pare ikārādesañāpanatthaṁ. Mātito, pitito, bhātito, duhitito.
anya-e0802n2:720: Tassa attano anto anattamāpajjate himhi vibhattimhi.
anya-e0802n2:724: Anattamitibhāvaniddesena attasaddassa sakādeso hoti sabbāsu vibhattīsu. Sako, sakā, sakaṁ, sake.
anya-e0802n2:726: Tato attato smiṁvacanassa ni hoti. Attani.
anya-e0802n2:728: Tatoattato sassa vibhattissa no hoti, attano.
anya-e0802n2:730: Tato attato smā vacanassa nā hoti. Attanā.
anya-e0802n2:731: Puna tatogahaṇena tassa attano takārasseva rakāro hoti sabbesu vacanesu. Atrajo, atrajaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:737: Tasmā ghapato smiṁ vacanassa yaṁ hoti vā.
anya-e0802n2:738: Kaññāyaṁ , kaññāya. Rattiyaṁ, rattiyā. Itthiyaṁ, itthiyā. Yāguyaṁ, yāguyā. Vakhuyaṁ, vadhuyā.
anya-e0802n2:740: Sabbesaṁ yonaṁ ni hoti vā napuṁsakehi liṅgehi.
anya-e0802n2:744: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi yonaṁ ni hoti niccaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:745: Yāni, yāni. Tāni, tāni. Kāni, kāni. Bhayāni, bhayāni. Rūpāni, rūpāni.
anya-e0802n2:747: Akārantehi napuṁsakaliṅgehi sivacanassa aṁ hoti niccaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:750: Tato niddiṭṭhehi ligehi sesakhatā gasiiccete lopamāpajjante.
anya-e0802n2:751: Bhoti itthi, sā itthī. Bho daṇḍi, so daṇḍī. Bho sattha, so satthā. Bho rāja, so rājā. Sesatoti kimatthaṁ? Puriso gacchati.
anya-e0802n2:754: Sabbāsaṁ vibhattīnaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanānaṁ paṭhamā dutiyātatiyā catutthī pañcamī chaṭṭhī sattamīnaṁ lopo hoti, āvuso upasagga nipātaiccevamādīhi ca,
anya-e0802n2:755: Tvaṁ panāvuso, tumhe panāvuso, padaso dhammaṁ vāceyya, vihāraṁ sve upagaccheyya.
anya-e0802n2:756: Pa, parā, ni, nī, u, du, saṁ, vi, ava, anu, pari, adhi, abhi, pati, su, ā, ati, api, apa, upa, pahāro, parābhavo, nihāro, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṁhāro, vihāro, avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro, apihāro, apahāro, upahāro, evaṁ vīsati upasaggehi ca.
anya-e0802n2:757: Yathā, tathā, evaṁ, khalu, kho, tatra, atho, atha, hi, tu ca, vā, vo, haṁ, abhaṁ, alaṁ, eva, ho aho, he , ahe, re, are, evamādīhi nipātehi ca yojetabbāni.
anya-e0802n2:760: Pumaiccetassa anto lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu.
anya-e0802n2:766: Aṁ vacanassa yaṁ hoti vā īto pasaññato.
anya-e0802n2:771: Tasmā jhato katarassā aṁ vacanassa naṁ hoti.
anya-e0802n2:776: Sabbesaṁ yonaṁ jhato katarassā no hoti.
anya-e0802n2:777: Daṇḍino bhogino, he daṇḍino, he bhogino.
anya-e0802n2:782: Tasmā jhato katarassā smiṁvacanassa niāde so hoti.
anya-e0802n2:786: Kimiccetassa ko ca hoti vapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:788: Caggahaṇena avapaccaye parepi ko ca hoti. Ko taṁninditu marahati, kathaṁ bodhayituṁ dhammaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:791: Kimiccetassa ku hoti hiṁ haṁiccetesu ca. Kuhiṁ gacchasi, kulaṁ gacchasi.
anya-e0802n2:792: Caggahaṇena hiñcanaṁdācanaṁ paccayesu paresu aññatthāpi ku hoti. Kuhiñcanaṁ, kudācanaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:794: Kimiccetassa ko hoti sesesu vibhattipaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0802n2:795: Ko pakāro kathaṁ, kaṁ pakāraṁ kathaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:798: Kimiccetassa ku hoti tratotha iccetesu ca.
anya-e0802n2:802: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:805: Sabbassa etasaddassa akāro hoti niccaṁ trapaccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:808: Sabbassa etasaddassa ekāro hoti vā tothaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:810: 234, 265.Imassi thaṁ dāni ha to dhesu ca.
anya-e0802n2:811: Imasaddassa sabbasseva ikāro hoti thaṁ dānihato dhaiccetesu.
anya-e0802n2:814: Imasaddassa sabbasseva akāro hoti dhunāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:818: Sabbasseva imasaddassa etādeso hoti rahimhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:824: Nadādito vāanadāditovā itthiyaṁ vattamānāya īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:825: Nadī, mahī, kumārī, taruṇī, sakhī, itthī.
anya-e0802n2:827: Ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntuiccetehi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi īpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:828: Māṇavī, paṇḍavī, nāvikī, venateyyī, kunteyyī, gotamī, guṇavatī, sāmāvatī.
anya-e0802n2:830: Pati bhikkhu rājīkārantehi itthiyaṁ vattamānehi inīpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0802n2:831: Gahapatānī, bhikkhunī, rājinī, hatthinī, daṇḍinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī.
anya-e0802n2:833: Sabbasseva ntupaccayassa takāro hoti vā īkāre pare.
anya-e0802n2:834: Guṇavatī, guṇavantī, kulavatī, kulavantī, satimatī. Satimantī, mahatī, mahantī, gottamatī, gottamantī.
anya-e0802n2:836: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhotādeso hoti īkāre itthigate pare.
anya-e0802n2:837: Bhoti ayye, bhoti kaññe, bhoti kharādiye.
anya-e0802n2:839: Sabbasseva bhavantasaddassa bhoādeso hoti ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:840: Bho purisa, bho aggi, bho rāja, bho sattha, bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu.
anya-e0802n2:842: Tuggahaṇena aññasmimpi vacane sabbassa bhavantasaddassa bhonta bhante bhonto bhadde bhotā bho toiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0802n2:843: Bhonta, bhante, bhonto, bhadde, bhotā, bhoto.
anya-e0802n2:845: Akāro ca pitādīnamanto ca attamāpajjate ge pare.
anya-e0802n2:846: Bho purisā, bho rājā, bho pitā, bho mātā, bho satthā.
anya-e0802n2:849: Bho daṇḍi, bho sayambhu, bhoti itthi, bhotivadhu,
anya-e0802n2:852: Bho rāja, bho rājā, bho atta, bho attā, bho sakha, bho sakhā, bho sattha, bho satthā.
anya-e0802n2:856: Toādi yesaṁ paccayānaṁ, te honti tvādayo. Te paccayā tvādayo vibhattisaññāva daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0802n2:857: Sabbato, yato, tato, kuto, ato, ito, sabbadā, yadā, tadā, kadā, idha, idāni.
anya-e0802n2:860: Sabbato, yato, tato, kuto, ato, ito.
anya-e0802n2:863: Trathaiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe sabba nāmehi.
anya-e0802n2:864: Sabbatra, sabbattha, yatra, yattha, tatra, tattha.
anya-e0802n2:866: Sabbaiccetasmā dhipaccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. Sabbadhi, sabbasmiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:874: Tamhā ca hi haṁiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe. Tahiṁ, tahaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:877: Imasmā hadhaiccete paccayā honti sattamyatthe. Iha, idha.
anya-e0802n2:880: Tasmā yato hiṁpaccayo hoti sattamyatthe. Yahiṁ.
anya-e0802n2:884: Kiṁ sabbaañña eka ya kuiccetehi dā dācanaṁiccete paccayā honti kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:885: Kadā, sabbadā, aññadā, ekadā, yadā, kudācanaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:887: Taiccetasmā dāni dāiccete paccayā honti, kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:891: Imasmā rahi dhunā dāniiccete paccayā honti kāle sattamyatthe.
anya-e0802n2:895: Sabbaiccetassa sakārādeso hoti vā dāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0802n2:899: Bāhussaccaṁ, paṇḍiccaṁ, vepullaṁ, kāruññaṁ, kosallaṁ, sāmaññaṁ, sohajjaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:901: Sabbasseva vuḍḍhasaddassa joādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:904: Sabbasseva pasatthasaddassa soādeso hoti, jādeso ca iyaiṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:907: Sabbassa antikasaddassa nedādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:910: Sabbassa bāḷhasaddassa sādhādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:913: Sabbassa appasaddassa kaṇa ādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:916: Sabbassa yuvasaddassa kaṇa ādeso hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:920: Vantumantuvīiccetesaṁ paccayānaṁ lopo hoti iyaiṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu.
anya-e0802n2:921: Guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho, satiyo, satiṭṭho, medhiyo, medhiṭṭho.
anya-e0802n2:922: 269, 401.Yavataṁ ta la ṇa dakārānaṁ byañjanāni ca la ña jakārattaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:923: Yakāravantānaṁ ta la ṇa dakārānaṁ byañjanāni ca la ña jakārattamāpajjante yathāsaṅkhyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:924: Bāhussaccaṁ, paṇḍiccaṁ, vepullaṁ, kāruññaṁ, kosallaṁ, nepuññaṁ, sāmaññaṁ, sohajjaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:926: Ta la ṇa dakārānamiti kimatthaṁ? Ālasyaṁ, ārogyaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:930: Amha tumhanturāja brahma atta sakha satthu pituiccevamādīhi smāvacanaṁ nāva daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0802n2:931: Mayā, tayā, guṇavatā, raññā, brahmunā, attanā, sakhinā, satthārā, pitarā, mātarā, bhātarā, dhītarā, kattārā, vattārā.
